title: The Whitehell
text: Out from the hidden places in the North comes a creeping colorless doom.
blocka: Attach to the current mission path for the spotlight player.
blockb: xxACTION Test (Lore 4). If passed, gain 2 xxMANA dice and burn threat. Otherwise, gain 2 xxDISCORD.

title: The Necromancer
text: A cloaked figure hangs above the ground, limp and lifeless, but the power exuding from it tells you that it is not all that it seems.
blocka: Attach to the Musty Tomb
blockb: xxACTION Test (Lore 4). If passed, discard.
blockc: xxELDRITCH One character at a North Oaks location is Weary.

title: Restless Dead
text: A mere shadow of a human, walking like a marionette yanked on strings.
blocka: Attach to the Gray River
blockb: xxACTION Test (Combat). For every two successes, discard one Restless Dead at this location.

title: Restless Dead
text: Dead, grey eyes stare back at you, liveliness long gone and replaced with a blank stare.
blocka: Attach to current mission path.
blockb: xxACTION Test (Combat). For every two successes, discard one Restless Dead at this location.

title: The Standing Stone
text: Scribbled on a stone are what appear to be coded Imperial messages. Who from Red Bank is sending these messages?
blocka: Gain one xxFORTUNE die.

title: Engines of Progress
text: It takes time to build something that will last.
blocka: You may spend one xxTIMBER to add two mission progress.

title: The Last Necromancer
text: There are signs that the Necromancer of North Oaks was not alone. But was he master... or servant?
blocka: Gain one xxFORTUNE die

title: Restless Dead
text: The soulless husk limping towards you reeks of rotting flesh.
blocka: Attach to current mission path.
blockb: xxACTION Test (Combat). For every two successes, discard one Restless Dead at this location.

title: Grueling Wilds
text: The weather in North Oaks is wild and unpredictable.
blocka: Attach to current mission path.
blockb: xxACTION Test (Survival 3). If passed, discard.
blockc: xxMISFORTUNE One character at a North Oaks location is weary.

title: Restless Dead
text: The creature's face is sagging to one side, like wax placed in a flame, their features beyond recognition. The very image of them sends shivers down your spine.
blocka: Attach to current mission path.
blockb: xxACTION Test (Combat). For every two successes, discard one Restless Dead at this location.

title: Exploration Force
text: What the new recruits lack in experience they make up for in heart.
blocka: May spend any number of xxFOOD dice to gain an equal number of xxFORTUNE dice.

title: Restless Dead
text: The creature groans, the sound of bare bone scraping painfully against the earth echoing in your ears.
blocka: Attach to current mission path.
blockb: xxACTION Test (Combat). For every two successes, discard one Restless Dead at this location.

title: Restless Dead
text: Clearly victims of a terrible pox, come back to share their misery.
blocka: Attach to current mission path.
blockb: xxACTION Test (Combat). For every two successes, discard one Restless Dead at this location.

title: Forest Boar
text: Peek your head in there and see if it's empty.
blocka: Test (Combat 2). If passed, gain one xxFORTUNE die. Otherwise, one character taking the test is weary.

title: Rocky Terrain
text: Your footing doesn't look so good!
blocka: Test (Survival 2). If you pass, gain 1 xxFORTUNE die. Otherwise, take 2 xxDISCORD.

title: Timber Source
text: The woods around North Oaks are dense and full of usable timber.
blocka: Gain one xxTIMBER die.

title: Radiant Fernbrake
text: The pale red plant has a vast number of uses. However, it is very difficult to harvest correctly.
blocka: Optional: Test (Lore 2). If passed, gain 1 xxLUXURY die. Otherwise, one character at mission location is exhausted.

title: Timber Source
text: The woods around North Oaks are dense and full of usable timber.
blocka: Gain one xxTIMBER die.

title: Eldritch Energy
text: Ripples of magic ebb out from some chaotic source deeper within the forest.
blocka: Test (Lore 2). If passed, gain 1 xxFORTUNE die. Otherwise, one character at mission location is weary.

title: Abandoned Mine
text: Scattered mines from old Amber Hand outposts can still be found in the forest.
blocka: Gain one xxORE die.

title: Sudden Storm
text: Stop whining and keep moving! You want to freeze to death?
blocka: Test (Survival 3). If passed, gain one xxFORTUNE die. Otherwise, take 2 xxDISCORD.

title: Timber Source
text: The woods around North Oaks are dense and full of usable timber.
blocka: Gain one xxTIMBER die.

title: Forest Sprite
text: Out of the mists, a shimmering figure appears, no bigger than a toad.
blocka: Gain one xxMANA die.

title: Smoke on the Ayrie
text: The worm rests his head each night on mana untold. Retrieving it may have catastrophic results for Red Bank.

title: Ancient Symbols
text: In shadow of Sightrock are carved messages in a forgotten language, foretelling dark days ahead.
rsummary: If you choose to decipher the symbols, one character in Sightrock is shaken and gain one secret.

title: Following Ley Lines
rsummary: Gain a number of xxMANA dice equal to Sorcery.

title: Golden Burrower
rsummary: Test (Combat 2). Success: +1 xxFORTUNE die. Failure: Weary.

title: Deadfall
rsummary: Test (Survival 2). Success: +1 xxFORTUNE die. Failure: +2 xxDISCORD.

title: Storms
rsummary: Test (Survival 2). Success: +1 xxFORTUNE die. Failure: +2 xxDISCORD.

title: Secretive Magic

blockb: Success: Discard.

title: Ile

blockb: Success: Discard.

title: Radia's Dark Lore
text: Radia is the sage and oracle of Gravewood. She whispers in your ear about Red Bank's dark past, and a growing danger in your midst.
rsummary: Optionally, you may gain three xxSECRETS and one character at a Gravewood mission locaion is shattered.

title: Mysterious Technology
text: A black obsidian key, shimmering with highlights of brass, capable of opening almost any lock.
rsummary: Play on a character at a Gravewood location.

title: Samo's Humiliations
text: What kind of dung brain doesn't know what snow cat tracks look like? How is it possible that you have survived this long, bereft of both wits and beauty?
rsummary: If Samo is in play, Test (Command 2). If you fail, all characters making the test are angry.

title: Imperial Agent
text: They have been caught this time, but what does this presage for the future?

title: The Island of Apples
text: The gods made the island invisible to shield Yari's people from the Sunriders. But the Yarifolk became vain - and stayed too long - and the gods turned Yari into The Weaver, guarding his spider silk of invisibility amongst the undead.

title: Verdant Fields
text: The springs are lush with life, and all is well in the world. Time for rest.

title: Keeper of Swords
text: I'm not sure if your fighting spirit is up to the task? Sad, really.
rsummary: Test (Command 1). If you fail, gain two xxDISCORD.

title: Sdila's Hunt
text: The leader of First Haven kept an unrelenting pace through the traces of snow and mud, in singular pursuit of his quarry. While the hunt continued, so did the judgement.
rsummary: Test (Survival 1). If you fail, gain one xxDISCORD.

title: Insider Information
rsummary: Test (Disguise 1). If you fail, gain two xxDISCORD.

title: Visiting Diplomats
rsummary: Test (Command 2). If you fail, gain two xxDISCORD.

title: A Friend in Need
rsummary: Test (Lore 1). If you fail, one character making the test is angry.

title: Setting Traps with Radia
rsummary: Test (Thievery 1). If you fail, one character making the test is weary

title: Galya's Egalitarian Society
rsummary: Test (Rapport 2). If you fail, one character making the test is frustrated

title: Council with Lev and Sdila
rsummary: Test (Rapport 1). If you fail, gain two xxDISCORD.

title: A Summit of the Five Havens
rsummary: Test (Command 1). If you fail, gain two xxDISCORD.

title: Graycloak
text: Wait? Who did you say you were here to see?
blocka: xxACTION (Test Disguise). For every two successes, discard one Guard at this location.

title: Graycloak
text: Did you hear that?
blocka: xxACTION (Test Disguise). For every two successes, discard one Guard at this location.

title: Graycloak
text: I just don't like the way you look.
blocka: xxACTION (Test Disguise). For every two successes, discard one Guard at this location.

title: Graycloak
text: Well, they provide three square meals.
blocka: xxACTION (Test Disguise). For every two successes, discard one Guard at this location.

title: Graycloak
text: Cool sword, right?
blocka: xxACTION (Test Disguise). For every two successes, discard one Guard at this location.

title: Graycloak
text: One more for the road. And then one more after that.
blocka: xxACTION (Test Disguise). For every two successes, discard one Guard at this location.

title: Graycloak
text: I'm just here for the rest and relaxation.
blocka: xxACTION (Test Disguise). For every two successes, discard one Guard at this location.

title: Graycloak
text: I've stabbed people for far less. That's the reason I took this job. That and they threatened to kill my family.
blocka: xxACTION (Test Disguise). For every two successes, discard one Guard at this location.

title: A Cold Place
rsummary: The streets of Eastkeep are punishing, but secrets are there for the taking - if you're willing to pay the price. You may make a character in the Into the Cold mission area weary to bank four progress.

title: The Thea Dossier
rsummary: You have discovered meticulous notes detailing a campaign to discredit and destroy everything Thea loves. Gain one xxSECRETS and Thea is angry.

title: The Resistance
rsummary: There are whispers and rumors of discontent throughout the Empire. Fear keeps the populace from action, but perhaps there are allies to be gained? Gain one xxFORTUNE die.

rsummary: (Test Rapport 2). If you pass, gain one xxFORTUNE die. If you fail, one character taking the test is frustrated.

title: Safehouse

title: Intercepted Plans
rsummary: The Guild of Secrets has grown complacent and overconfident. Getting information is easier than expected. Gain one xxSECRETS.

title: Captured Ally
text: Freeing the young Ivian from capture would greatly aid Resistance morale.
